meanings.definition: A very large retail store that offers a wide variety of products.
meanings.sent1: The megastores in our town sell everything from clothes to electronics.
meanings.sent2: People often visit megastores to buy groceries, clothes, and household items in one place.
meanings.sent3: I went to the megastores and accidentally bought a giant inflatable pool - oops!
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a messy megastore, filled with all sorts of items scattered around.
meanings.sent5: The megastores stood tall like giants, beckoning shoppers with their endless aisles of goods.

meanings.definition: The largest type of retail store, typically offering a wide range of goods and services.
meanings.sent1: During the holiday season, the megastores are bustling with customers looking for gifts.
meanings.sent2: Megastores often have special promotions to attract more shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The megastores were so huge that I got lost trying to find the checkout counter!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a megastore of ideas, each one more exciting than the last.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the lights of the megastores illuminated the parking lot, creating a vibrant scene.
